bug.short_desc: [user] Extracting change set from SVN project have an index out of bound exception

long_desc.thetext:
Index out of bound when trying to find review item using R4E and subclipse project I use for testing the svn project under the following site: http://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/subversion/trunk Then selected the subversion/svn project, checked-it-out and try to use R4E "Find review item"
java.lang.IndexOutOfBoundsException: Index: 0, Size: 0 at java.util.ArrayList.RangeCheck(Unknown Source) at java.util.ArrayList.get(Unknown Source) at org.eclipse.mylyn.internal.subclipse.ui.GetChangeSetDialog.createFormContent(GetChangeSetDialog.java:248) at org.eclipse.ui.forms.FormDialog.createDialogArea(FormDialog.java:92) at org.eclipse.jface.dialogs.Dialog.createContents(Dialog.java:760) at org.eclipse.jface.window.Window.create(Window.java:431) at org.eclipse.jface.dialogs.Dialog.create(Dialog.java:1089) at org.eclipse.jface.window.Window.open(Window.java:790) at org.eclipse.mylyn.internal.subclipse.ui.connector.SVNConnectorUi.getChangeSet(SVNConnectorUi.java:55) at org.eclipse.mylyn.reviews.r4e.ui.internal.commands.FindReviewItemsHandler.execute(FindReviewItemsHandler.java:140)

The artifact paths were not build correctly when the svn project was mounted several segments down the root path of the repository The repository path was taken from the checked out root rather than the repository root which caused duplicated segments in the artifact path.
